metadata.title: CVE-2024-53589 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
GNU objdump 2.43 is vulnerable to Buffer Overflow in the BFD (Binary FileDescriptor) library's handling of tekhex format files.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-53589` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-arc-linux-gnu - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabihf - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-common - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-for-build - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-for-host - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-hppa-linux-gnu - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-hppa64-linux-gnu - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-i686-gnu - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-i686-linux-gnu - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-ia64-linux-gnu - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-loongarch64-linux-gnu - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-m68k-linux-gnu - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-multiarch - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc-linux-gnu - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc64-linux-gnu - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc64le-linux-gnu - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-riscv64-linux-gnu - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-s390x-linux-gnu - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-sh4-linux-gnu - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-source - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-sparc64-linux-gnu - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-x86-64-gnu - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-x86-64-linux-gnu - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
binutils-x86-64-linux-gnux32 - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
libbinutils - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
libctf-nobfd0 - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
libctf0 - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
libgprofng0 - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
libsframe1 - 2.43.1-4ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: binutils package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.43.1-4ubuntu1').
